name: Nhentai telegram bot
description: A simple Nodejs telegram bot for reading doujings from nhentai, instantly up and running (not always).

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: App name again (should be the same)

DATABASE_URL.description: URL to connect to your database https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/get-started-with-mongodb-atlas/

DATABASE2_URL.description: URL to your second database if you want to store users separately

IGNORED_TAGS.description: Tags that will be ignored by default for all users, divided by ', '

TELEGRAPH_TOKEN.description: Will be created if not specified (https://telegra.ph/api#createAccount)
